                             float y1,
                             float z1,

                             float x2,

                             float ry2,
                             float rz2)
        Returns:

      • lerp

        public static final float lerp(float start,
                               float stop,
                               float amt)
        Calculates a number between two numbers at a specific increment. The amt parameter is the amount to interpolate between the two values where 0.0 equal to the first point, 0.1 is very near the first point, 0.5 is half-way in between, etc.
